attributes.action: Grant members of the British armed forces FREE travel on British public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that members of british armed forces should be granted free travel on public transport.  This would add to the vigilence on public transport as an extra security measure and give a graet boost of moral to some of our junior members who find it hard to pay for travel home due to low wages and high transport prices.
